summary: Feature request to add registerDelayedCallback method for more efficient testing in PHP SDK, similar to implementations in other Temporal SDKs.
userImpact: Users cannot write efficient tests that require delayed callbacks, limiting test coverage capabilities compared to other SDKs.
proposedFix: Implement registerDelayedCallback method following the pattern used in Go SDK (https://github.com/temporalio/samples-go/blob/main/updatabletimer/workflow_test.go#L24)
keyQuote: To write more efficient tests would be nice to support method like in other SDKs - `registerDelayedCallback`
